video.title: Music and Dance
video.synopsis: Kids can move, groove, and sing along with their favorite furry friends (and a few human pals, too) in this music and movement series.

episodes.synopsis: Abby goes to Big Bird's nest for her very first sleepover, but she soon realizes that there isn't anyone there to read her a book.
episodes.title: Abby's First Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: It's Bubblefest on Sesame Street! The festivities include a bubble mix mystery, a bubble riddle and a Bubblefest pop quiz.
episodes.title: The Bubblefest

episodes.synopsis: Through music, dance and food, Gina and Rosita teach Gina's adopted son, Marco, who was born in Guatemala, about Spanish language and culture.
episodes.title: The Latinization of Marco

episodes.synopsis: When Abby realizes she needs something to play for a music class, Grover appears with a suitcase full of instruments.
episodes.title: Great Vibrations

episodes.synopsis: Telly’s favorite singer, LMNOP is going to perform on Sesame Street but his entire entourage goes missing. Will he have to cancel his show?
episodes.title: Figure it Out Baby

episodes.synopsis: It’s Trashgiving Day and Oscar is in charge of the parade with an out-of-tune band, flat balloons, and wilted flowers.
episodes.title: Trashgiving Day
